issue.title: Update model paths on both gzclient and gzserver at runtime

content.raw:
Hi @chapulina,
Here is [the PR](#!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/2898/search-for-a-model-in-the-selected/diff), it is a fairly simple solution, I've open it a week ago and declined it because of the issue of communicating the paths between GzServer and GzClient.

I'm not sure where are the other places that uses that, 
calling 
```
grep -r 'AddModelPaths'
```
only shown the `InsertWidget`, should I search by s different key?
content.html:
